body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Auto Solutions. My name is Jeremy Washington. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Martha. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have been trying to locate a specific model of car, but it seems to be out of stock.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Martha. Could you please provide me with the color and year of the car you are looking for?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am looking for a midnight black two zero one nine model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information. Can you also share the make of the car you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It is a luxury sedan from ABC Motors.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing those details, Martha. I will look into the availability of the vehicle. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Martha. Have a great day!
